groups.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin
groups.description: Configuration properties for LangChain4j vivo LanXin integration.

groups.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.model
groups.description: Model parameters configuration for vivo LanXin.

groups.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool
groups.description: Thread pool configuration for streaming chat model.

groups.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.info
groups.description: Model information configuration for vivo LanXin.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable vivo LanXin integration.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.app-id
properties.description: vivo developer platform application ID.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.app-key
properties.description: vivo developer platform application key.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.model-name
properties.description: The name of the vivo LanXin model to use.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.domain
properties.description: API domain for vivo LanXin service.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.uri
properties.description: API URI for chat completions.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.stream-uri
properties.description: API URI for streaming chat completions.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.method
properties.description: HTTP method for API requests.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.model.temperature
properties.description: Controls randomness in the model's output. Higher values make output more random.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.model.max-output-tokens
properties.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.model.max-input-tokens
properties.description: Maximum number of tokens in the input.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.core-pool-size
properties.description: Core number of threads in the streaming thread pool.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum number of threads in the streaming thread pool.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.keep-alive-time
properties.description: Time in seconds that excess idle threads will wait for new tasks before terminating.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.queue-capacity
properties.description: Capacity of the thread pool's task queue.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Prefix for thread names in the streaming thread pool.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.allow-core-thread-time-out
properties.description: Whether core threads are allowed to time out.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.thread-pool.rejected-execution-handler
properties.description: Policy for handling rejected tasks. Options: ABORT, CALLER_RUNS, DISCARD, DISCARD_OLDEST.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.info.provider
properties.description: Model provider name.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.info.display-name
properties.description: Model display name.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.info.version
properties.description: Model version.

properties.name: langchain4j.vivo-lanxin.info.features
properties.description: List of supported features.
